docblock.description: A light-weight PHP image resizer with dynamic caching.
A light-weight PHP image resizer with dynamic caching.
docblock.long-description:
A simple solution to fulfil the most common image resizing tasks with GD.

Features

  • Supported Image Types
    • JPEG
    • GIF + Transparency
    • PNG + Transparency
  • Resize
    • Standard/Proportional
    • Crop-to-fit
    • Letterbox
    • Percentage
  • Manipulation
    • Sharpen
    • Rotate
    • Aspect Ratio toggle
    • Contrain dimensions
    • Quality/Compression
  • File Saving
    • Custom destination path
    • Automated cache with custom expiration setting

Example 1:

Resize and save an image to a specfic location.

try {
    include_once("imagelite.class.php");

    $srcUri = ImageLite::inst("./src.jpg")->sharpen(7)->resize(100,200)->save("./new.jpg")->getUri();

    echo "<img src='{$srcUri}' />";
}
catch (Exception $e) {
    echo $e->getMessage();
}

Example 2:

Resize an image and store it in the cache.

try {
    include_once("imagelite.class.php");

    ImageLite::setCacheRootDirectory("/path/to/images/cache/directory", true);

    $img = ImageLite::inst("/path/to/src/image.jpg")->quality(70)->resize(100,200)->save();

    echo "<img src='". $img->getUri() ."' />";
}
catch (Exception $e) {
    echo $e->getMessage();
}

Example 3:

Resize an image and store it in the cache (note that chaining is not used).

try {
    include_once("imagelite.class.php");

    ImageLite::setCacheRootDirectory("/path/to/cache/directory", true);
    ImageLite::setMode(0777);
    ImageLite::setCacheUri("/assets/cache/");

    $img = ImageLite::inst("/path/to/original/image.jpg");
    $img->quality(70);
    $img->aspectRatio(false);
    $img->sharpen(8);
    $img->resize(100,200);
    $img->save();
    echo "<img src='". $img->getUri() ."' />";
}
catch (Exception $e) {
    echo $e->getMessage();
}

The width of the source image

docblock.description: The status of whether the aspect ratio of the image should be maintained
Quality of the image when resized
docblock.long-description: Range: 0 (worst quality/small file size) to 100 (best quality/large file size)

docblock.description: The angle in degrees in which to rotate an image
The level of sharpening that should be applied to an image
Contrain the re-sizing of an image to it's original dimensions
Save resized image to this custom file path rather than the cache

tag.name: param
tag.description: Path to the image file

tag.name: param
tag.description: The path to the image file

tag.name: param
tag.description: The path to the image file

docblock.long-description: This is for developer purposes only. Call this method to output helpful information during development.

docblock.description: Get bytes from shorthand byte notation
docblock.long-description: If a suffix is not found, then the original value is returned

tag.name: example
tag.description:
getBytes("1G");
Returns: 1073741824

tag.name: example
tag.description:
getBytes("1M");
Returns: 1048576

tag.name: example
tag.description:
getBytes("1K");
Returns: 1024

tag.name: example
tag.description:
getBytes("1024");
Returns: 1024

tag.name: param
tag.description: A number followed by a suffix of 'G' (Gig), 'M' (Megabytes) or 'K' (Kilobytes)

docblock.long-description: Based on the width/height of the source image and the current memory limit we must estimate how much memory will be required to resize the image without exhausting the memory. ie. Prevent an error such as "Fatal error: Allowed memory size of 76532345 bytes exhausted (tried to allocate 345 bytes) in page.php

tag.name: param
tag.description: A file path can be added to the message (optional)

tag.name: return
tag.description: String: Memory will potentially be exhausted. False: Memory will not be exhausted.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Path to the root cache directory

tag.name: param
tag.description: Create the directory

tag.name: example
tag.description:
setCacheRootDirectory("/home/website/public_html/assets/cache", true);
Create the directory path if not found and if 2nd argument is TRUE

tag.name: param
tag.description: URI path to the root cache directory

tag.name: example
tag.description:
setCacheRootUri("/cache/");
Absolute URI path to cache.

tag.name: example
tag.description:
setCacheRootUri("assets/cache");
Relative URI path to cache.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Path to document root directory. Default: $_SERVER["DOCUMENT_ROOT"].

tag.name: param
tag.description: A time period set as a negative (eg. -3 months)

tag.name: example
tag.description:
setLifetime(null);
Image will never expire (default)

tag.name: example
tag.description:
setLifetime("-1 month");
Creates a new image after 1 month

tag.name: example
tag.description:
setLifetime("-30 seconds");
Creates a new image after 30 seconds

tag.name: link
tag.description: Preferred format for $lifetime

docblock.long-description: The mode set by this method will be applied to directories and images that are automatically created

tag.name: param
tag.description: An octal integer

tag.name: example
tag.description:
setMode(0600);
Read and write for owner, nothing for everybody else

tag.name: example
tag.description:
setMode(0644);
Read and write for owner, read for everybody else

tag.name: example
tag.description:
setMode(0755);
Everything for owner, read and execute for others

tag.name: example
tag.description:
setMode(0750);
Everything for owner, read and execute for owner's group

tag.name: param
tag.description: Path to the directory

tag.name: param
tag.description: Set as true to ignore a filename in the path

docblock.description: Set the path to the image file

tag.name: param
tag.description: The path to the image file

tag.name: param
tag.description: Set as TRUE or FALSE

tag.name: example
tag.description:
aspectRatio(true);
Keep the aspect ratio

tag.name: example
tag.description:
aspectRatio(false);
Ignore the aspect ratio and fulfil the exact maximum dimensions

tag.name: param
tag.description: Range from 0 (worst quality) to 100 (best quality). Default is 75.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Range from 0 (no sharpening) to 100 (maximum sharpening). Default is 0.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Set as TRUE or FALSE. Default is TRUE.

tag.name: example
tag.description:
contrain(true);
Do not allow the image to be enlarged beyond its original dimensions.

tag.name: example
tag.description:
contrain(false);
Allow the image to be enlarged beyond its original dimensions.

tag.name: todo
tag.description: Potentially allow for degrees other than -90, -180, -270, 90, 180 and 270

tag.name: param
tag.description: The angle in degrees including negative numbers (eg. -90, 90, 180, 270). Default is 0 (no rotation).

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE (Yes, file has expired) or FALSE (No, file has not expired)

tag.name: param
tag.description: Range from 1 to 100

tag.name: param
tag.description: Max width (Note: constrain() has no affect)

tag.name: param
tag.description: Max height (Note: constrain() has no affect)

tag.name: example
tag.description:
resizeCropToFit(250);
Resize and crop image to match 250x250.

tag.name: example
tag.description:
resizeCropToFit(null, 300);
Resize and crop image to match 300x300.

tag.name: example
tag.description:
resizeCropToFit(250, 300);
Resize and crop image to match 250x300.

docblock.long-description:
Expect the following for background colours:
JPEG: Only a solid background colour can be applied.
PNG: A solid & transparent background colour can be applied.
GIF: A solid background colour can be applied or a full transparency is used if $bgAlpha is 127

tag.name: param
tag.description: Max width.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Max height

tag.name: param
tag.description: 6-digit hexadecimal background colour (eg. "FFFFFF" = White)

tag.name: param
tag.description: Transparency of the background colour, range between 0 (opaque) and 127 (transparent).

tag.name: example
tag.description:
resizeLetterbox(250);
Resize image to match 250x250 using a letter box effect.

tag.name: example
tag.description:
resizeLetterbox(null, 300);
Resize image to match 300x300 using a letter box effect.

tag.name: example
tag.description:
resizeLetterbox(250, 300);
Resize image to match 250x300 using a letter box effect.

tag.name: example
tag.description:
resizeLetterbox(250, 300, "FFFFFF");
Resize image to match 250x300 using a letter box effect with a white background.

tag.name: example
tag.description:
resizeLetterbox(250, 300, "FFFFFF", 80);
Resize image to match 250x300 using a letter box effect with a transparent white background.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Max width.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Max height

tag.name: example
tag.description:
resize(250);
Resize to the max width.

tag.name: example
tag.description:
resize(null, 300);
Resize to the max height.

tag.name: example
tag.description:
resize(250, 300);
Resize to fit within height and width.

tag.name: example
tag.description:
aspectRatio(false)->resize(250);
Disregard aspect ratio and resize to max width.

tag.name: example
tag.description:
aspectRatio(false)->resize(null, 300);
Disregard aspect ratio and resize to max height.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Path to a custom destination file (if populated this is used instead of the cache path)

tag.name: param
tag.description: Create the custom directory path of $customDestinationFilePath if missing

tag.name: example
tag.description:
save();
Image is resized and stored in the cache.

tag.name: example
tag.description:
save("./new/image.jpg");
Image is resized and stored in a custom destination.

tag.name: example
tag.description:
save("./new/path/image.jpg", true);
The path (./new/path/) is created (if missing), image is resized and then stored in the custom destination.
